attributes.contentHtml:
DinoTheDev basically:

  • it's a fricking free host- what do you expect... they somehow have 20 LEGAL nodes though (even though maintains go brr) so they prob know how to handle dbh
  • danbot was down due to a bot token leak and their panel was raided at the same time too, which is highly suspcious
  • dan cares about his host- even if he's "guilty" of these inconveniences, he's trying to make his host better for FREE too so you gotta give him respect for that
  • don't expect every host to be perfect
  • https://drama.gg/d/1071-dbh-scummy-hosting/2 is a fucking joke, bullshit. ( reason: https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/899035482678255628/899056256835264612/unknown.png )
  • dan forgot to update every ptero panel (he load balances, humans make mistakes)
  • small rumor that dan leaked config files before (Armic claims to)
  • whoever "raided" had access to bot files but due to etc, the raider had admin access (so only dan or solo most likely)
  • too lazy to write more

attributes.bio: drama.gg sucks but I guess here I am.

attributes.title: Something to do with DanBot Hosting. (DBH)
